title: Ajmal Waste and Damage Solutions
description: A cross-platform mobile app built with React Native and Expo for reporting and managing waste and damage issues, featuring a clean interface, multi-language support, and easy access to scheduling, complaints, technical support, and emergencies.

title: Message Me
description: A modern Next.js and Supabase demo app enabling user registration, login, and personalized pages, featuring a clean UI and smooth animations for a sleek experience.

title: MultiApp
description: A technical assessment project showcasing Next.js, Supabase, and TypeScript skills, featuring multiple mini-apps demonstrating authentication, CRUD operations, and file storage.

title: Genshin Archives
description: A Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS app featuring an interactive database of Genshin Impact characters, regions, artifacts, and weapons, with search and filter options by element, weapon type, and rarity.
